comprehensive_overview: scGen is a deep learning framework for generating bulk-level transcriptomic profiles from single-cell RNA-sequencing data. It predicts the influence of genetic and environmental factors on gene expression at a population-level, bridging the resolution gap between single-cell and bulk-level omics data.
core_features: Generates bulk-level transcriptomic profiles from scRNA-seq data
Predicts gene expression influenced by genetic and environmental factors
Bridges resolution gap between single-cell and bulk-level omics data
Utilizes deep learning techniques for modeling gene expression
